posts.message: what is a good solution to full drive encryption [including OS partition] in windows 8 except for bitlocker and truecrypt ??

In JavaScript or jQuery you often need to find out which key was pressed. Unfortunately, we don’t have it as easy as comparing it against a string like “esc” or “space bar”.
Each key on the keyboard is associated with a number, or what we call a keyCode and it is accessed on the event object.
posts.caption: keycode.info

posts.message:
Sending & receiving emails is a pain in the neck. Mandrill is trying to solve this problem. It's very fast. The free quota is 12K/month, which is enough when you're starting. It's by MailChimp, so they know what they are doing.

Notable competing services are SendGrid & Postmark.
posts.caption: mandrill.com
posts.description: Mandrill is a new way for apps to send transactional email. It runs on the delivery infrastructure that powers MailChimp.
